articles.content: India faced consecutive defeats in the FIVB Volleyball Boys U-19 World Championship 2023 after going down 0-3 against Japan in their second match on August 4 (Friday). The Indian U-19 team lost 12-25… [+2666 chars]

articles.description: Parthib Gogoi scored his first senior hat-trick and that too, in the Durand Cup 2023. Here's all the three goals in details.
articles.content: NorthEast United kickstarted their 2023-24 season on the right note, as they bagged an emphatic win in their opening game of the coveted Durand Cup. The Highlanders claimed a 4-0 win against Northeas… [+1801 chars]
